/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with vehicles, including cars, buses, and trucks, all moving in different directions, creating a dynamic tableau of urban life. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. The sky itself is a blanket of gray clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
